verses.verse: "I am <S%H1875>inquired<s%> of by those who <S%H3808>didn't<s%> <S%H7592>ask;<s%> I am <S%H4672>found<s%> by those who <S%H3808>didn't<s%> <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H559>me:<s%> I said, See <S%H1471>me,<s%> see me, to a nation that was not <S%H7121>called<s%> by my <S%H8034>name.<s%>

I have spread <S%H6566>out<s%> my <S%H3027>hands<s%> all the <S%H3117>day<s%> to a <S%H5637>rebellious<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> who <S%H1980>walk<s%> in a <S%H1870>way<s%> that is not <S%H2896>good,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> their own <S%H4284>thoughts;<s%>

a <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H3707>provoke<s%> me to my <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H8548>continually,<s%> <S%H2076>sacrificing<s%> in <S%H1593>gardens,<s%> and burning <S%H6999>incense<s%> on <S%H3843>bricks;<s%>

who <S%H3427>sit<s%> among the <S%H6913>graves,<s%> and <S%H3885>lodge<s%> in the secret <S%H5341>places;<s%> who <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H2386>pig<s%>'s <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and <S%H4839>broth<s%> of <S%H6292>abominable<s%> things is in their <S%H3627>vessels;<s%>

who <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H7126>Stand<s%> by <S%H5066>yourself,<s%> don't come near to <S%H6942>me,<s%> for I am holier than <S%H6227>you.<s%> These are a smoke in my <S%H639>nose,<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> that <S%H3344>burns<s%> all the <S%H3117>day.<s%>
<S%H3789>"Behold,<s%> it is written <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2814>me:<s%> I will not keep silence, but will <S%H7999>recompense,<s%> <S%H7999>yes,<s%> I will recompense into their <S%H2436>bosom,<s%>

your own <S%H5771>iniquities,<s%> and the <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "who have burned <S%H6999>incense<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and <S%H2778>blasphemed<s%> me on the <S%H1389>hills;<s%> therefore will I <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H4058>measure<s%> their <S%H6468>work<s%> into their <S%H2436>bosom.<s%>"

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "As the new <S%H8492>wine<s%> is <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H811>cluster,<s%> and one <S%H559>says,<s%> <S%H7843><s%> 'Don't destroy <S%H1293>it,<s%> for a blessing is in <S%H6213>it:<s%>' so will I do for my <S%H5650>servants<s%>' <S%H7843>sake,<s%> that I may not destroy them all.

I will bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> a <S%H2233>seed<s%> out of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and out of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> an <S%H3423>inheritor<s%> of my <S%H2022>mountains;<s%> and my <S%H972>chosen<s%> shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> <S%H5650>it,<s%> and my servants shall dwell <S%H7931>there.<s%>

<S%H8289>Sharon<s%> shall be a <S%H5116>fold<s%> of <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> and the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H5911>Achor<s%> a place for <S%H1241>herds<s%> to lie down <S%H7258>in,<s%> for my <S%H5971>people<s%> who have sought <S%H1875>me.<s%>

"But you who <S%H5800>forsake<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> who <S%H7913>forget<s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> who <S%H6186>prepare<s%> a <S%H7979>table<s%> for <S%H1409>Fortune,<s%> and who <S%H4390>fill<s%> up mixed <S%H4469>wine<s%> to <S%H4507>Destiny;<s%>

I will <S%H4487>destine<s%> you to the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and you shall all bow <S%H3766>down<s%> to the <S%H2874>slaughter;<s%> because when I <S%H7121>called,<s%> you <S%H6030>didn't<s%> answer; when I <S%H1696>spoke,<s%> you <S%H8085>didn't<s%> listen; but you <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H977>chose<s%> that in which I <S%H2654>didn't<s%> delight."

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H5650>"Behold,<s%> my servants shall <S%H398>eat,<s%> but you shall be <S%H7456>hungry;<s%> <S%H5650>behold,<s%> my servants shall <S%H8354>drink,<s%> but you shall be <S%H6770>thirsty;<s%> <S%H5650>behold,<s%> my servants shall <S%H8055>rejoice,<s%> but you shall be <S%H954>disappointed;<s%>

<S%H5650>behold,<s%> my servants shall <S%H7442>sing<s%> for <S%H2898>joy<s%> of <S%H3820>heart,<s%> but you shall <S%H6817>cry<s%> for <S%H3511>sorrow<s%> of <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and shall <S%H3213>wail<s%> for <S%H7667>anguish<s%> of <S%H7307>spirit.<s%>

You shall <S%H3240>leave<s%> your <S%H8034>name<s%> for a <S%H7621>curse<s%> to my <S%H972>chosen;<s%> and the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H4191>kill<s%> <S%H7121>you;<s%> and he will call his <S%H5650>servants<s%> by <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H8034>name:<s%>

so that he who <S%H1288>blesses<s%> himself in the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H1288>bless<s%> himself in the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H543>truth;<s%> and he who <S%H7650>swears<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H7650>swear<s%> by the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H543>truth;<s%> because the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H6869>troubles<s%> are <S%H7911>forgotten,<s%> and because they are <S%H5641>hidden<s%> from my <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

<S%H1254>"For,<s%> behold, I create <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H776>earth;<s%> and the <S%H7223>former<s%> things shall not be <S%H2142>remembered,<s%> nor <S%H5927>come<s%> into <S%H3820>mind.<s%>

But be you <S%H7797>glad<s%> and <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> <S%H5703>forever<s%> in that which I <S%H1254>create;<s%> <S%H1254>for,<s%> behold, I create <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> a <S%H1525>rejoicing,<s%> and her <S%H5971>people<s%> a <S%H4885>joy.<s%>

I will <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H7797>joy<s%> in my <S%H5971>people;<s%> and there shall be <S%H8085>heard<s%> in her no more the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H1065>weeping<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H2201>crying.<s%>

"There shall be no more there an <S%H5764>infant<s%> of <S%H3117>days,<s%> nor an old <S%H2205>man<s%> who has not <S%H4390>filled<s%> his <S%H3117>days;<s%> for the <S%H5288>child<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> and the <S%H2398>sinner<s%> being one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> shall be <S%H7043>accursed.<s%>
They shall <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H1004>houses,<s%> and <S%H3427>inhabit<s%> <S%H5193>them;<s%> and they shall plant <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> their <S%H6529>fruit.<s%>

They shall not <S%H1129>build,<s%> and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H3427>inhabit;<s%> they shall not <S%H5193>plant,<s%> and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H398>eat:<s%> for as the <S%H3117>days<s%> of a <S%H6086>tree<s%> shall be the <S%H3117>days<s%> of my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and my <S%H972>chosen<s%> shall long <S%H1086>enjoy<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of their <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

They shall not <S%H3021>labor<s%> in <S%H7385>vain,<s%> nor bring <S%H3205>forth<s%> for <S%H928>calamity;<s%> for they are the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of the <S%H1288>blessed<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and their offspring with <S%H6631>them.<s%>
It shall happen <S%H7121>that,<s%> before they call, I will <S%H6030>answer;<s%> and while they are yet <S%H1696>speaking,<s%> I will <S%H8085>hear.<s%>

The <S%H2061>wolf<s%> and the <S%H2924>lamb<s%> shall <S%H7462>feed<s%> <S%H259>together,<s%> and the <S%H738>lion<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H8401>straw<s%> like the <S%H1241>ox;<s%> and <S%H6083>dust<s%> shall be the <S%H5175>serpent<s%>'s <S%H3899>food.<s%> They shall not <S%H7489>hurt<s%> nor <S%H7843>destroy<s%> in all my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
